question: When did the third battle of Panipat fought?
explanation: The Third Battle of Panipat was fought on January 14, 1761, between the Afghan invader Ahmad Shah Abdali and the Marathas under Sadashivrao Bhau Peshwa of Pune. Maratha power was severely defeated in the battle and Balaji Baji Rao unable to bear the shock of the disaster, died in June 1761 AD.
